ch.ethz.inspire.emod.gui.graph

Class AIONode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.piccolo2d.PNode
      • org.piccolo2d.extras.nodes.PComposite
        • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.gui.graph.AIONode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputNode, OutputNode

    public abstract class AIONode
extends org.piccolo2d.extras.nodes.PComposite
    AIONode class Generic representation of an IOContainer in the grphical representation of the mode. This type is intended to be child of a AGraphElement. The element provides an clickable rectangle to interact with the node.
    Author:
    sizuest
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
